headline: Will Cain on 'Fox & Friends': DeSantis has 'changed the equation' for woke corporations
author: Fox News Staff
sentences: And if they want to get involved in the politics of those particular states, I don't think they should plan on filming movies in Texas or in Georgia and getting favorable tax breaks.
The co-host of "Fox & Friends Weekend" said DeSantis pushing back against Disney has changed the cost of being political for many companies.
So all of a sudden, I think any corporation, any industry that says let's get political has to understand the cost of getting political.
Ron DeSantis has changed the "one-way street" corporations used to protest local politics, Will Cain argued Friday on "Fox & Friends."
WILL CAIN: I think that for years, corporations have had a one-way street to protest in favor of woke politics.
So, you know, Hollywood gets tax breaks in a lot of states to come in and film their movies.
And we've seen it numerous times, often in sports, when it comes to these state policies.
The NBA protesting the bathroom bill, the trans bathroom bill some years ago.
They may be able to count on it, but Ron DeSantis has changed that equation.
He said, OK, fine, you want to play politics, then we can play as well.
You don't get the benefit of our political and governmental policy.
Governor Ron DeSantis changed that one-way street.
